about_the_game:
Cardist Party is an online multiplayer party game designed exclusively for 4 players.
Note: A full group of 4 players is required.

About the Board Game

The main elements are dice rolling and cards!

  • Victory Condition
    At the end of the final turn, add up the number of spaces you’ve landed on during the game and the bonus points from your hand (the number in the top-left corner of each card).
    The player with the highest total score wins.

  • What You Can Do During Your Turn
    At the start of your turn, draw one card and roll the dice.
    Move forward based on the number rolled.
    After moving, you can play up to two cards from your hand.

  • Mini-Games
    Once everyone has taken their turn, a mini-game begins. After the mini-game, each player receives one card.
    The strength of the card you receive depends on your ranking in the mini-game.

Current Key Features

  • Three game modes:
    ・Board game
    ・Mini-game battle
    ・Mini-game free play

  • Around 30 types of cards

  • Customizable board game rules:
    Adjust turn count, toggle mini-games, and more

  • Approximately 13 mini-games
